live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
52665.summary: Some customers in the Willowgrove area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
52665.title: Aug 19 - Saskatoon (Willowgrove) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
